about_the_game:
Our Ice Queen arrived & heated everyone in Shelter:69. Meet her & discover all the secrets tied to her fiery relationship with Kiara.

ABOUT FROZEN

Age: 18
Height: 166 cm
Blood: B
Bust size: B
Origin: USA, Nevada
Interests: Challenging Kiara

She seemed like a slightly shy girl who wasn't really close to anyone. That all changed with Kiara, but... I assume you heard the story already. She wasn't the same afterward, and ultimately, she left, about the time Tess disappeared.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING


This DLC unlocks the legendary champion - Frozen, with 120 trust, enough to immediately reach level 10.

You will also receive an epic equipment set, allowing you to use her in missions immediately, along with a legendary look for Frozen (or its equivalent in nanites if you already have it).

And of course, by purchasing this DLC, you are supporting us. Thank you!

This DLC is non-refundable after activation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Lesbian Sex
- Android Sex
- Consensual BDSM and bondage
- Punishment and instances of non-consensual sexual activities
